settings.copy: Control your energy with Pzaz¬Æ Breath Spray. Our research team is dedicated to creating the most convenient, delicious, and enjoyable way to wake up. Learn more below:

settings.question: How does Pzaz work?
settings.answer:
Pzaz is the most convenient and controlled way to wake up.

Every spray contains a highly bioavailable blend of caffeine and vitamins that your body absorbs much faster and more efficiently than with any other beverage or supplement.

The result? Fast-acting energy and focus with no jitters or crash.

settings.question: How much does Pzaz cost?
settings.answer:
One tube of Pzaz costs $3.99, which means every serving costs only $0.40.

Unlock lower pricing by purchasing more than one flavor online, or by visiting our retailers using applicable promotions.

settings.question: How many sprays should I take?
settings.answer: Taste 5 sprays and feel a burst of energy and focus.

settings.question: How many calories are in Pzaz?
settings.answer: None ü§ù Pzaz has zero calories, zero sugar, and zero artificial flavors.

settings.question: What flavors does Pzaz come in?
settings.answer:
Pzaz comes in three delectable flavors: super sour, berry blast, and mint frost.

We also occasionally release limited edition flavors :-)

settings.question: Where is Pzaz manufactured?
settings.answer: Our research team develops and tests our formulations in New York City. Then, our product is manufactured at a nearby facility registered with the FDA and in compliance with federally recognized Good Manufacturing Practices.

settings.question: What is microdosing?
settings.answer: Microdosing something means consuming a very small amount of it in order to unlock its optimal effects with no crash or side effects.

settings.question: Why microdose caffeine?
settings.answer:
Too much caffeine causes stress and insomnia. But little bits can actually focus and calm you down.

‚Ä®Since 1923, scientists have shown that caffeine is an incredible performance enhancer, but too much and it has the opposite effect.

Pzaz is the only way to quickly and comfortably microdose caffeine. Spray by spray, feel fast-acting energy all day long with no crash or jitters.

settings.question: What are the potential benefits to microdosing?
settings.answer: Microdose caffeine to experience mental clarity and optimal physical performance without any sleeplessness or anxiety.

settings.question: Where is my Pzaz?
settings.answer: Every order ships with a tracking number! Email us with your order number if you think we can help you with a package :-)

settings.question: Do you really have a Money Back Guarantee?
settings.answer: Yes, we really do. Click here to read the full terms and conditions of our Returns and Refunds policies.

settings.question: What is the Pzaz bottle made from?
settings.answer:
Pzaz spray bottles are manufactured using previously recycled plastic waste.

Our bottles are designed to deliver energy with far less of a water, material, and carbon impact on the environment than with any energy drink or bottled beverage.

settings.question: Can I recycle Pzaz?
settings.answer: Check with your local waste management protocols, but Pzaz is fully recyclable in many municipalities.

settings.question: Do you have any future sustainability initiatives?
settings.answer:
Yes! We are always working on sourcing more environmentally friendly ingredients, supporting clean and fair manufacturers, and developing revolutionary bio-plastics and algae-based alternatives to plastic.

We also work to lobby governments to minimize the variety of plastic allowed and better encourage circularity like with aluminum.

settings.question: What does your Plastic Negative‚Ñ¢ certification mean?
settings.answer:
For every tube sold, we ensure that two tubes worth of plastic litter are removed from the earth.

This means that using Pzaz always has a net negative effect on the amount of plastic waste circulating in landfills and waterways around the world.

We do this in partnership with RePurpose Global and women-owned waste management companies around the world.

So far, we've removed the equivalent of hundreds of thousands of littered energy drinks and coffees.

settings.question: Why does Pzaz taste so much better than an energy drink?
settings.answer: Maxxie and Jonah whippin in the kitchen

settings.question: What sweeteners do you use?
settings.answer:
Our flavor and chemistry team has developed a revolutionary blend of natural flavors that sweeten Pzaz while effectively masking the bitterness of caffeine.

We also experiment with natural derivatives of sugar such as zero-calorie sucralose.

settings.description: Receive free shipping, free accessories, and a free limited edition fanny pack when you purchase five or more tubes. Try another flavor?
